#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(1)
	{
		if(a==0||b==0)
		break;
		int carry=0,f=0;
		while(1)
		{
			carry=((a%10+b%10)>=10)?1:0;
			if(carry==1)
			f+=1;
			a/=10;
			b/=10;
			if(a<=0||b<=0)
			break;
		}
		if(f==0)
		cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
		else if(f==1)
		cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
		else
		cout<<f<<" carry operations."<<endl;
		cin>>a>>b;
	}
	return 0;
}
